name: hAI! Friend MR
summary:
Meet Your Perfect AI Companion

Connect in a whole new way with hAI! Friend MR, your AI-powered companion for VR and AR. Create a lifelike animated avatar from a photograph, personalize their appearance and personality, and enjoy natural, real-time conversations anytime with an empathetic, multilingual AI.

Whether you’re seeking friendly conversation, emotional support, or a calming presence, hAI! Friend MR grows with you—remembering preferences for a truly personal experience.
